18440.name: Crazy Machines 2: Back to the Shop Add-On
18440.description:
Satisfy your brains puzzle craving with even more Crazy Machines 2! Ratchet up the fun and tinker around with over 60 all-new levels! Challenge yourself with a wild new batch of elements including a monster truck, electrostatic fields, fiber optic cables, a hot air balloon and so much more. Dont waste a minute  get back into the game!

Key Features:

  • 60 New Levels
  • Two New Background Themes
  • 12 New Elements including Monster trucks, car lifts, fiber optic cables, electrostatic fields, hot air balloons, and more
  • Nine New Decoration Elements such as lawn gnomes, wheelbarrows, wash-bowls.
